Hero.tagline: Increase your interview chances with a perfectly tailored resume.
Hero.title: Resume Matcher

Login.title: Sign In
Login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

Errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
Errors.uploadMissingId: Upload succeeded but no resume ID received.
Errors.uploadUnknown: An unknown error occurred during upload.

Upload.promptDrag: Drag & drop or click (PDF, DOCX up to {size})

ResumeUploadPage.title: Upload Your Resume
ResumeUploadPage.description: Upload a PDF or DOCX. The file is processed locally and used only for analysis.
ResumeUploadPage.note: Formats: PDF, DOCX • Max 2MB • No permanent storage.

MatchPage.title: Match & Improve
MatchPage.resumeIdHelp: Last upload is auto-filled if available.
MatchPage.noResult: No result yet – provide a Resume ID & job description.

DashboardPage.title: Your Resume Matcher Dashboard
DashboardPage.subtitle: Manage your resume and analyze its match with job descriptions.
DashboardPage.resumeDescription: This is your resume. Update it via the resume upload page.

meta.title: Credits & Billing | Resume Matcher
meta.description: Manage your credits, purchase credit packages, and view your billing history for Resume Matcher services.

page.title: Credits & Billing
page.description: Manage your Resume Matcher credits, purchase additional credits, and track your usage history.

purchase.title: Purchase Credits
purchase.description: Choose the perfect credit package for your resume analysis and job matching needs.

security.title: Secure Payment
security.description: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. Your payment information is never stored on our servers.

examples.title: What can you do with credits?

history.title: Credit History
history.subtitle: Track your credit purchases and usage

empty.title: No transactions found
empty.message_all: Your credit transactions will appear here
empty.message_filtered: No transactions match the selected filter

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Your credits have been added to your account. You can now use Resume Matcher features.

canceled.title: Payment Canceled
canceled.message: Your payment was canceled. No charges were made to your account.

error.title: Payment Error
error.message: There was an error processing your payment. Please try again or contact support.

warning.low_balance: Low credit balance. Consider purchasing more credits to continue using features.

security.title: Secure Payments
security.description: All payments are processed securely through Stripe with industry-standard encryption.

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.description: Unused credits can be refunded within 30 days of purchase. Contact support for assistance.

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to help with any billing or credit-related questions.

Meta.title: Resume Matcher
Meta.description: Optimize and improve your resume against job descriptions with ATS-aware keyword matching.
